Key Match Events: Josh Smith’s two-run single in the seventh inning
Victor Mederos walked the Nos. 8 and 9 batters with two outs
Kirby Yates worked the ninth for his 28th save in 29 chances
Pre-Game Insights: The Rangers won for the ninth time in 12 games, their best such stretch this season.
The Rangers are 8 1/2 games behind American League West-leading Houston and 7½ games out of a wild-card spot with 19 to play.
Post-Match Reflections: Smith expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win.
Bochy highlighted the Rangers' fight and desire to keep going out there and playing hard, trying to win ballgames.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Taylor Ward's 22nd homer extended his on-base streak to 17 games
Ezequiel Duran's two-run double in the fifth
Neto scored from second base on a wild pitch in the sixth
Andrew Chafin's 90 mph sinker bounced and ricocheted hard off catcher Jonah Heim toward the Texas dugout
